original_text: So why do you want to discover all my sins? Why do you hurry to do that? So why do you want to discover all my sins?
korean_text: 나의 허물을 찾으시며 나의 죄를 들추어내시나이까

sentences.original_text: So why do you want to discover all my sins?
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신은 내 모든 죄를 알고 싶어 합니까?

sentences.original_text: Why do you hurry to do that?
So why do you want to discover all my sins?
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신은 내 모든 죄를 알고 싶어 합니까?
